suggestion: Do 10 jumping jacks while humming your favorite song
Stare at a wall and pretend it's the most interesting thing you've ever seen
Practice your acceptance speech for an award you'll never win
Have a conversation with your houseplant about the weather
Do your best impression of a robot learning to dance
Write a haiku about your current snack
Practice your superhero pose in the mirror
Organize your desk by color, then by size, then give up and mess it up again
Take a walk and count how many different shades of green you can see
Learn a new word in a foreign language and use it in three sentences
Draw a portrait of your coffee mug from memory
Research a random Wikipedia article and become an expert on something weird
Do some stretches while pretending you're a cat waking up from a nap
